Class FleetManagement

java.lang.Object
FleetManagement
public class FleetManagement extends Object
FleetManagement system for loading, saving, and modifying a fleet of boats. Handles CSV input on first run and DB file input on subsequent runs. It allows users to: - Print the fleet - Add a boat to the fleet - Remove a boat from the fleet - Add expenses to a boat
Author:
Muhammad Ahsan Saleem

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method that runs the Fleet Management System, does all the file handling, fills the fleet ArrayList, gets the menu option input from the user, and calls the appropriate method to perform the required task.
      Parameters:
      args - optional file name for CSV input (on first run)

    • readFromCSVFile

      public static void readFromCSVFile(ArrayList<Boat> fleet, String fileName) throws IOException
      Reads boat data from a CSV file and loads it into the fleet.
      Parameters:
      fleet - the ArrayList of boats to populate
      fileName - the CSV file path
      Throws:
      IOException - if reading fails

    • writeToDBFile

      public static void writeToDBFile(ArrayList<Boat> fleet, String fileName) throws IOException
      Writes the fleet data to a DB file in a serialized form.
      Parameters:
      fleet - the ArrayList of boats to save
      fileName - the DB file to write to
      Throws:
      IOException - if writing fails

    • readFromDBFile

      public static void readFromDBFile(ArrayList<Boat> fleet, String fileName) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      Reads boats from a serialized DB file and loads them into the fleet.
      Parameters:
      fleet - the ArrayList to populate
      fileName - the DB file to read from
      Throws:
      IOException - if reading fails
      ClassNotFoundException - if Boat class is not found

    • getMenuOption

      public static String getMenuOption()
      Displays the menu and gets the user's selection.
      Returns:
      the chosen menu option as an uppercase letter

    • printFleet

      public static void printFleet(ArrayList<Boat> fleet)
      Prints all boats in the fleet and the total purchase price and expenses.
      Parameters:
      fleet - the ArrayList of boats

    • findIndexOfBoat

      public static int findIndexOfBoat(String boatName, ArrayList<Boat> fleet)
      Finds the index of a boat in the fleet by name.
      Parameters:
      boatName - the name of the boat to search for
      fleet - the ArrayList of boats
      Returns:
      the index of the boat, or -1 if not found

    • addExpense

      public static void addExpense(int index, ArrayList<Boat> fleet)
      Adds an expense to a selected boat, ensuring limits are not exceeded.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the boat in the fleet
      fleet - the ArrayList of boats
